description.english: Play throught the first hour of the game without skipping any cutscenes.
description.german: Spiele die erste Stunde ohne eine Filmszene zu überspringen.
description.french: Jouer la première heure du jeu sans passer de cinématique.
description.italian: Non saltare alcuna sequenza animata nel corso della prima ora di gioco.
description.koreana: 처음 한 시간 동안 컷신을 넘기지 않고 진행하십시오.
description.spanish: Disfruta de la primera hora de juego sin omitir ninguna secuencia.
description.schinese: 完成前四个游戏，不跳过任何过场动画
description.japanese: カットシーンを1つもスキップせずにゲームの最初の1時間を完了
description.polish: Ukończ pierwszą godzinę rozgrywki bez pomijania żadnego z filmików.
description.brazilian: Jogue a primeira hora do jogo sem ignorar nenhuma entrecena.

description.english: Land the plane in the mountains.
description.german: Lande das Flugzeug in den Bergen.
description.french: Faire atterrir l'avion dans les montagnes.
description.spanish: Aterriza con el avión en las montañas.
description.japanese: 飛行機を山に着陸させる
description.brazilian: Aterrisse o avião nas montanhas.

description.english: Learn the Preacher's current destination.
description.german: Finde den aktuellen Zielort des Proesters heraus.
description.french: Découvrir où se cache le Prêtre.
description.italian: Scopri dove è diretto il Predicatore.
description.spanish: Descubre dónde está el Predicador.
description.japanese: 牧師の現在地を知る
description.brazilian: Descubra o destino atual do Pregador.

description.english: Learn how to neutralize the Reaper.
description.german: Finde heraus, wie man den Reaper neutralisiert.
description.french: Apprendre comment neutraliser les Faucheurs.
description.spanish: Descubre cómo neutralizar al Segador.
description.japanese: 死神を無力化する方法を知る
description.brazilian: Descubra como neutralizar o Ceifeiro.

description.english: Repair the cableway.
description.german: Repariere die Seilbahn.
description.french: Réparer le funiculaire.
description.spanish: Repara el teleférico.
description.japanese: ロープウェイを直す
description.brazilian: Conserte o teleférico.

description.english: Send the Beast to the bottom of the ravine.
description.german: Sende das Biest auf den Boden der Schlucht.
description.french: Envoyer la bête au fond du ravin.
description.italian: Fai cadere la Bestia nel burrone.
description.spanish: Envía a la bestia al fondo del barranco.
description.japanese: 獣を山脈の奥底へ行かせる
description.brazilian: Envie a Besta para o fundo do desfiladeiro.

description.english: Find the way to the trapped ally.
description.german: Finde den Weg zur eingeschlossenen Allee.
description.french: Rejoindre votre allié coincé.
description.koreana: 함정에 빠진 동료에게 접근할 방법을 찾으십시오.
description.spanish: Consigue llegar hasta el aliado atrapado.
description.schinese: 找到办法赶到被困同伴处
description.japanese: 捕まった仲間のところまで行く
description.brazilian: Descubra o caminho para o aliado preso.

description.english: Pass the blizzard.
description.german: Überwinde den Schneesturm.
description.french: Traverser le blizzard.
description.spanish: Sobrevive a la tormenta.
description.japanese: 吹雪を突破する
description.brazilian: Passe a nevasca.

description.english: Find the entrance to the burried barrack.
description.german: Finde den Eingang zur verdeckten Baracke.
description.french: Trouver l'entrée de la réserve ensevelie.
description.italian: Trova il modo di accedere alla baracca sepolta.
description.spanish: Encuentra la entrada al barracón enterrado.
description.japanese: 埋もれた兵舎の入り口を見つける
description.brazilian: Encontre a entrada do quartel soterrado.

description.english: Uncover the body hidden in the snow.
description.german: Räume den im Schnee begrabenen Körper frei.
description.french: Découvrir le corps enseveli sous la neige.
description.italian: Trova il corpo nascosto dalla neve.
description.spanish: Descubre el cadáver oculto en la nieve.
description.japanese: 雪に埋もれた人を見つける
description.brazilian: Descubra o corpo escondido na neve.

description.english: Learn about Raphael's sacrifice.
description.german: Erfahre mehr über Raphaels Opfer.
description.french: En apprendre plus sur le sacrifice de Raphaël.
description.italian: Vieni a sapere del sacrificio di Raffaele.
description.spanish: Infórmate sobre el sacrificio de Rafael.
description.japanese: ラファエルの儀式について知る
description.brazilian: Aprenda sobre o sacrifício de Rafael.

description.english: Complete the game.
description.german: Vollende das Spiel.
description.french: Terminer le jeu.
description.spanish: Llega al final del juego.
description.japanese: ゲームをクリアする
description.brazilian: Conclua o jogo.

description.english: Complete the bonus adventure.
description.german: Vollende das Bonus-Abenteuer.
description.french: Terminer l'aventure bonus.
description.spanish: Completa la aventura adicional.
description.japanese: ボーナスストーリーをクリア
description.brazilian: Conclua a aventura bônus

description.english: Perform 3 Evidence Deductions without a wrong move.
description.german: Vollführe 3 Beweis-Schlussfolgerungen, ohne falsch zu folgern.
description.french: Réussir 3 déductions sans erreur.
description.italian: Compi 3 deduzioni esatte senza commettere errori.
description.spanish: Completa 3 deducciones sin realizar ningún movimiento erróneo.
description.schinese: 进行３次证物推理而不犯错
description.russian: Постройте 3 дедукции по уликам без неверных ходов.
description.japanese: 1度も間違えずに3つの証拠品を正しく分析
description.brazilian: Execute 3 deduções de Evidências sem um movimento errado.

description.english: Perform all the Evidence Deductions.
description.german: Vollführe alle Beweis-Schlussfolgerungen.
description.french: Réussir toutes les déductions.
description.spanish: Completa todas las deducciones.
description.japanese: 全ての証拠分析を行う
description.polish: Wykonaj wszystkie Wnioskowania dotyczące zebranych dowodów.
description.brazilian: Execute todas as deduções de Evidências.

description.english: Perform your first Evidence Deduction.
description.german: Vollführe deine erste Beweis-Schlussfolgerung.
description.french: Réussir votre première déduction.
description.spanish: Completa tu primera deducción.
description.japanese: 最初の証拠分析を行う
description.brazilian: Execute a sua primeira dedução de Evidência.

description.english: Collect all Evidence.
description.german: Sammle alle Beweise.
description.french: Collecter toutes les preuves.
description.spanish: Reúne todas las pruebas.
description.japanese: 全ての証拠を集める
description.brazilian: Recolha toda Evidência.

description.english: Finish a Hidden Object Puzzle with less than 4 mistaps.
description.german: Vollende eine Wimmelbildszene ohne vier Mal falsch zu tippen.
description.french: Terminez une scène d'objets cachés avec moins de 4 mauvais clics.
description.italian: Finite un puzzle di oggetti nascosti con meno di 4 tocchi sbagliati.
description.koreana: 미스클릭 4 회 이내로 숨은 그림 퍼즐을 완료하세요.
description.spanish: Encuentra un Puzzle de Objeto Oculto sin pulsar mal mas de 4 veces.
description.schinese: 不超过4个误点完成隐藏物品智利游戏。
description.russian: Пройти сцену с поиском предметов, нажав мимо предметов менее 4 раз.
description.japanese: アイテム探しパズルの誤ったタップを4回未満でクリアする。
description.polish: Ukończ Scenę z Ukrytymi Obiektami, popełniając mniej niż 4 błędy.
description.brazilian: Complete o jogo de caça-objetos com menos de 4 erros de toque.

description.english: Finish any Hidden Object Puzzle in less than 1 minute.
description.german: Vollende eine Wimmelbildszene in weniger als einer Minute.
description.french: Terminer un casse-tête Objets cachés en moins d'une minute.
description.italian: Completa una scena con oggetti nascosti in meno di 1 minuto.
description.spanish: Completa un puzle de objetos ocultos en menos de 1 minuto.
description.schinese: １分钟内完成所有隐藏物品谜题
description.russian: Решите головоломку с поиском предметов меньше чем за 1 минуту.
description.japanese: 1分以内でアイテム探しパズルをクリア
description.polish: Ukończ Scenę z Ukrytymi Obiektami w ciągu minuty.
description.brazilian: Termine qualquer Enigma de Objeto Oculto em menos de 1 minuto.

description.english: Find 3 hidden-objects within 3 seconds.
description.german: Finde 3 versteckte Objekte in 3 Sekunden.
description.french: Trouver 3 objets cachés en 3 secondes.
description.spanish: Encuentra 3 objetos ocultos en menos de 3 segundos.
description.japanese: アイテム探しで3アイテムを3秒以内に発見
description.brazilian: Encontre 3 objetos ocultos em 3 segundos.

description.english: Finish all Hidden Object Puzzles without using hints.
description.german: Vollende alle Wimmelbildszenen, ohne einen Tipp zu benutzen.
description.french: Terminer tous les casse-têtes Objets cachés sans utiliser d'indice.
description.italian: Completa tutti i rompicapi con oggetti nascosti senza aiuti.
description.koreana: 힌트를 사용하지 않고 숨은 물건 찾기를 모두 완료하십시오.
description.spanish: Completa todos los puzles de objetos ocultos sin usar pistas.
description.schinese: 不用提示完成所有隐藏物品谜题
description.russian: Решите все головоломки с поиском предметов без советов.
description.japanese: ヒントを使わずに全てのアイテム探しをクリア
description.polish: Ukończ wszystkie Sceny z Ukrytymi Obiektami, nie używając Wskazówek.
description.brazilian: Termine todos os Enigmas de Objeto Oculto sem usar Dicas.

description.english: Finish 6 Hidden Object Puzzles in a row without using hints.
description.german: Vollende 6 Wimmelbildszenen in Reihe ohne einen Tipp zu benutzen.
description.french: Terminer 6 casse-têtes Objets cachés d'affilée sans utiliser d'indice.
description.italian: Completa 6 rompicapi con oggetti nascosti di seguito senza aiuti.
description.koreana: 힌트를 사용하지 않고 숨은 물건 찾기를 6번 연속 완료하십시오.
description.spanish: Completa 6 puzles de objetos ocultos seguidos sin usar pistas.
description.schinese: 不用提示完成６个隐藏物品谜题
description.russian: Решите подряд 6 головоломок с поиском предметов без советов.
description.japanese: ヒントを使わずアイテム探しパズルを6連続でクリア
description.polish: Ukończ 6 Scen z Ukrytymi Obiektami pod rząd, bez używania Wskazówek.
description.brazilian: Termine 6 Enigmas de Objeto Oculto seguidos sem usar Dicas.

description.english: Find a Morphing Object.
description.german: Finde ein morphendes Objekt.
description.french: Trouver un Objet changeant.
description.spanish: Encuentra un objeto cambiante.
description.japanese: 変化アイテムを1つ発見
description.brazilian: Ache um item em transmutação.

description.english: Find half of all Morphing Objects.
description.german: Finde die Hälfte aller morphenden Objekte.
description.french: Trouver la moitié des Objets changeants.
description.spanish: Encuentra la mitad de los objetos cambiantes.
description.japanese: 変化アイテムを全体の半数発見
description.brazilian: Encontre metade dos objetos em transmutação.

description.english: Find all Morphing Objects.
description.german: Finde alle morphenden Objekte.
description.french: Trouver tous les Objets changeants.
description.spanish: Encuentra todos los objetos cambiantes.
description.japanese: 変化アイテムを全て発見
description.brazilian: Ache todos os objetos em transmutação.

description.english: Find a Widow's Sorrow.
description.german: Find eine Trauerweide.
description.french: Trouver une Peine de la veuve.
description.spanish: Encuentra una Lamento de la Viuda.
description.japanese: 未亡人の悲しみを発見
description.brazilian: Encontre um Pesar da Viúva.

description.english: Find half of all Widow's Sorrows.
description.german: Finde die Hälfte aller Trauerweiden.
description.french: Trouver la moitié des Peines de la veuve.
description.italian: Trova metà dei Dolori della vedova.
description.spanish: Encuentra la mitad de las flores Lamento de la Viuda.
description.japanese: 未亡人の悲しみを全体の半数発見
description.brazilian: Encontre metade dos Pesares da Viúva.

description.english: Find all Widow's Sorrows.
description.german: Finde alle Trauerweiden.
description.french: Trouver toutes les Peines de la veuve.
description.italian: Trova tutti i Dolori della vedova.
description.spanish: Encuentra todas las flores Lamento de la Viuda.
description.japanese: 未亡人の悲しみを全て発見
description.brazilian: Encontre todos os Pesares da Viúva.

description.english: Find a White Feather.
description.german: Finde eine weiße Feder.
description.french: Trouver une Plume blanche.
description.spanish: Encuentra una pluma blanca.
description.japanese: 白い羽根を1つ発見
description.brazilian: Encontre uma Pena Branca.

description.english: Find half of all White Feathers.
description.german: Finde die Hälfte aller weißen Federn.
description.french: Trouver la moitié des Plumes blanches.
description.spanish: Encuentra la mitad de las plumas blancas.
description.japanese: 白い羽根を全体の半数発見
description.brazilian: Encontre metade de todas as Penas Brancas.

description.english: Find all White Feathers.
description.german: Finde alle weißen Federn.
description.french: Trouver toutes les Plumes blanches.
description.spanish: Encuentra todas las plumas blancas
description.japanese: 白い羽根を全て発見
description.brazilian: Encontre todas as Penas Brancas.

description.english: Finish 4 Minigames in a row without skipping.
description.german: Vollende 4 Minispiele in Reihe, ohne eines zu überspringen.
description.french: Terminer 4 mini-jeux d'affilée sans passer.
description.italian: Completa 4 minigiochi di seguito senza saltarne nemmeno uno.
description.koreana: 숨은 물건 찾기를 넘기지 않고 4번 연속 완료하십시오.
description.spanish: Completa 4 minijuegos seguidos sin omitir ninguno.
description.schinese: 不用提示完成４个小游戏
description.japanese: スキップせずにミニゲームを4連続でクリア
description.brazilian: Termine 4 minijogos seguidos sem ignorar nenhum.

description.english: Finish any Minigame in less than 1 minute.
description.german: Vollende ein beliebiges Minispiel in weniger als 1 Minute.
description.french: Terminer n'importe quel mini-jeu en moins d'une minute.
description.italian: Completa un minigioco in meno di 1 minuto.
description.spanish: Completa cualquier minijuego en menos de 1 minuto.
description.russian: Завершите мини-игру меньше чем за 1 минуту.
description.japanese: 1分以内でミニゲームをクリア
description.polish: Ukończ Minigrę w ciągu zaledwie 1 minuty.
description.brazilian: Termine qualquer minijogo em menos de 1 minuto.

description.english: Finish all Minigames without Skipping.
description.german: Vollende alle Minispiele, ohne eines zu überspringen.
description.french: Terminer tous les mini-jeux sans passer.
description.italian: Completa tutti i minigiochi senza saltarli.
description.koreana: 넘기기를 사용하지 않고 미니게임을 모두 완료하십시오.
description.spanish: Completa todos los minijuegos sin omitir ninguno.
description.schinese: 不用提示完成所有小游戏
description.japanese: スキップせずに全てのミニゲームをクリア
description.brazilian: Termine todos minijogos sem ignorar nenhum.
